nodes.text: Baktoid Fleet Ordnance was a droid-manufacturing company which produced the HMP droid gunship. Their gunship was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

Baktoid Fleet Ordnance was first mentioned simultaneously in the Star Wars Legends reference books Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections and Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith: The Visual Dictionary, both of which released on the same day in 2005. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
